## Interactive Data Explorer

This interactive Shiny application <https://lq2250.shinyapps.io/p8105_final_group8_f1data/> allows you to explore Formula 1 fatal events data from 1950 to 2024. You can filter by year, constructor, driver, and fatal status to examine patterns in the data.

**Features:**

- **Circuit Map**: Visualize F1 circuits around the world with fatal event indicators
- **Analytics Dashboard**: Explore annual trends, constructor distributions, and nationality patterns
- **Data Table**: Browse and download filtered race results data
